issue.title: [C++] Build AWS C++ SDK for Windows in conda-forge
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4860](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4860). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We the aws-sdk-cpp package to be able to use the C++ SDK for S3 support. it is currently available for Linux and macOS

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4860?focusedCommentId=16912797) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Appears this was done in https://github.com/conda-forge/aws-sdk-cpp-feedstock/pull/91
